attributes.action: End the tradition of the Prime Minister’s  resignation honours list.
attributes.additional_details: Because the more recent honours lists have obviously had a friends & family bias. Also MPs getting upset because they’ve been denied - is ridiculous. The honours list shows politicians as self-serving & not active g in the interests of the public.
attributes.background: To stop the obvious nepotism in government. To stop PMs giving life long privileges to friends & family. To stop this misuse of public money.

rejection.details: The submission of nominations for honours and appointments by outgoing Prime Minister's is a convention, and the Government and Parliament cannot prevent outgoing Prime Minister's from submitting such nominations.
